title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.5 - Application for a prompt hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.5 - Application for a prompt hearing

State Regulations
(a) Written application for the hearing provided for in this Part must be mailed by
registered or certified mail to: New York State Tax Commission

Director of Tax Appeals Bureau

Building 9, State Office Campus

Albany, NY 12227
(b) The written application may, in the
alternative, be personally delivered to the offices of Director of Tax Appeals

Bureau in Albany. (c) The
application must state that it is an application for a prompt hearing regarding
a predecision warrant and contain the applicant's name, address and telephone
number and the name, address and telephone number of the applicant's
representative, if the applicant has a representative, together with a proper
power of attorney if one has not previously been furnished. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2394.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
